66.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

72.movie_plot: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

56.movie_plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

132.movie_plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

6.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

138.movie_plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

43.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

201.movie_plot: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

45.movie_plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

78.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

208.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

106.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

96.movie_plot: A failing Italian restaurant run by two brothers gambles on one special night to try to save the business.

35.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

10.movie_plot: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

136.movie_plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

170.movie_plot: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

110.movie_plot: In rural 1800s England things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.

77.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

194.movie_plot: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

75.movie_plot: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

76.movie_plot: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.

39.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

176.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

209.movie_plot: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

107.movie_plot: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

69.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

147.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

4.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

213.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

58.movie_plot: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

29.movie_plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

162.movie_plot: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter Patch Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

112.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

139.movie_plot: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

202.movie_plot: A group of twenty-something friends, most of whom live in the same apartment complex, search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

211.movie_plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

135.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

87.movie_plot: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

196.movie_plot: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.

1.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

164.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

210.movie_name: Shanghai Triad (Yao a yao yao dao waipo qiao) (1995)
210.movie_plot: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

193.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

64.movie_plot: Two counterculture bikers travel from Los Angeles to New Orleans in search of America.

120.movie_plot: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

167.movie_plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

104.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

24.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
24.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

148.movie_plot: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

113.movie_plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

131.movie_plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

52.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

214.movie_plot: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

98.movie_plot: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

189.movie_plot: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

25.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

156.movie_plot: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

184.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

19.movie_plot: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

93.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

51.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

95.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
95.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

21.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

180.movie_plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

134.movie_plot: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.

108.movie_plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

124.movie_plot: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine - the Mob - track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

146.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

54.movie_plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

101.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

159.movie_plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

32.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
32.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

205.movie_plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.

182.movie_plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

89.movie_plot: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

71.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)
71.movie_plot: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

116.movie_plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

188.movie_name: Man Who Would Be King, The (1975)
188.movie_plot: Two British former soldiers decide to set themselves up as kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

166.movie_plot: A sheltered young high society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.
